text: Neumeier is a surname that may refer to the following people *Bob Neumeier, American sportscaster *Dan Neumeier (born 1948), American baseball player *Edward Neumeier (born 1957), American screenwriter, producer and director *Jack Neumeier (born 1919, died 2004), American football coach and inventor of the spread offense *John Neumeier (born 1942), American ballet dancer, choreographer, and director *Mani Neumeier (born 1940), German rock musician *Tom Neumeier (1921–1991), Dutch Olympic rower
title: Neumeier
